decks.notes: This deck aims to control the game by utilizing lands to disrupt the opponent's strategy while slowly building up a win condition. By using cards like Crop Rotation and Life from the Loam to fetch key lands like Dark Depths and Thespian's Stage, the deck can create a powerful Marit Lage token. The inclusion of cards like Punishing Fire and Rishadan Port allows for disruption and control over the opponent's board. With a focus on land interactions and resource denial, this deck aims to outvalue the opponent and secure victory through a powerful end-game threat.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly assemble combo pieces that allow for explosive graveyard interactions. By utilizing cards like Altar of Dementia, Hogaak, Arisen Necropolis, Vengevine, and Bridge from Below, the deck aims to fill up the graveyard with creatures and then use sacrifice outlets to overwhelm the opponent. Stitcher's Supplier and Hedron Crab help to mill cards into the graveyard, while cards like Gravecrawler and Bloodghast can be repeatedly brought back for additional value. The deck also includes disruption in the form of Cabal Therapy to protect its combo pieces.

This deck aims to control the game by utilizing lands as both resources and threats. By leveraging cards like Mox Diamond, Exploration, and Crop Rotation, the deck quickly ramps up its mana production and locks down the opponent's resources with Wasteland and Rishadan Port. The main win condition revolves around creating the Dark Depths/Thespian's Stage combo to summon a 20/20 Marit Lage token. Additionally, the deck can generate value through cards like Punishing Fire and Life from the Loam, while also disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like The Tabernacle at Pendrell Vale and Bojuka Bog.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of counter spells and removal, using cards like Force of Will, Counterbalance, and Swords to Plowshares. It also utilizes card draw and manipulation with Brainstorm, Predict, and Mishra's Bauble to maintain card advantage and set up powerful plays. Monastery Mentor provides a win condition by generating tokens, while Teferi, Time Raveler and Jace, the Mind Sculptor offer additional control and card advantage. The deck also includes a few surprise elements like Unexpectedly Absent and Sevinne's Reclamation to disrupt the opponent's plans.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with creatures using cards like Stitcher's Supplier and Hedron Crab, then use Altar of Dementia and Bridge from Below to create a loop that brings back Hogaak, Vengevine, and Gravecrawler from the graveyard for a combo finish. The deck also utilizes cards like Careful Study and Cabal Therapy to control the opponent's hand and disrupt their strategy. This combo-centric strategy aims to overwhelm the opponent and win the game in a few turns.

The main focus of this UWx Control deck is to utilize a combination of powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Time Raveler and Jace, the Mind Sculptor, along with versatile control spells like Force of Will and Swords to Plowshares to control the game and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck also includes card advantage engines like Frantic Inventory and can quickly end the game with Entreat the Angels. The mana base includes various fetchlands and dual lands for color fixing and Mystic Sanctuary to recur important spells.

The deck focuses on assembling the combo of Dark Depths and Thespian's Stage to quickly create a 20/20 indestructible Marit Lage token. It also includes cards like Vampire Hexmage and Sylvan Safekeeper to protect the combo pieces, while utilizing cards like Crop Rotation and Elvish Reclaimer to search for key lands. The deck also incorporates disruptive elements such as Thoughtseize and Abrupt Decay to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The strategy revolves around efficiently assembling the combo while disrupting the opponent's plans, ultimately leading to a quick victory.

The deck focuses on assembling the Dark Depths combo as quickly as possible. It includes cards like Crop Rotation, Sylvan Scrying, and Thespian's Stage to search for and create the combo of Dark Depths and Thespian's Stage. It also includes disruption in the form of Duress, Thoughtseize, Pithing Needle, and Abrupt Decay to protect the combo and disrupt opponent's strategies. The deck aims to quickly create a 20/20 Marit Lage token by sacrificing Dark Depths with Vampire Hexmage or using Sylvan Safekeeper for protection.

The key strategy of this deck is to control the game by utilizing a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and powerful planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Oko, Thief of Crowns. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Force of Will and Swords to Plowshares while generating card advantage with cards like Brainstorm and Sylvan Library. Additionally, the deck features a strong snow mana base with cards like Arcum's Astrolabe and Dead of Winter to maintain control over the board.

This deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan by locking down their mana base with Blood Moon, Magus of the Moon, and Chalice of the Void while deploying aggressive threats like Goblin Rabblemaster and Bonecrusher Giant. It also utilizes powerful artifacts like Trinisphere and Ensnaring Bridge to control the board and protect its planeswalkers, Karn, the Great Creator and Chandra, Torch of Defiance. With a fast mana base consisting of Chrome Mox, Ancient Tomb, and City of Traitors, this deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent and secure victory through a combination of disruption and aggression.

This deck focuses on locking down the opponent's resources and disrupting their game plan with cards like Chalice of the Void, Trinisphere, and Ensnaring Bridge. It also uses powerful artifacts like Chrome Mox and Grim Monolith to ramp into big threats like Chandra, Torch of Defiance and Karn, the Great Creator. The inclusion of Blood Moon and Blood Sun helps disrupt the opponent's mana base, while Bonecrusher Giant and Abrade provide additional removal options. The deck aims to quickly close out games through aggressive plays and powerful threats.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize the Dredge mechanic to quickly fill the graveyard with cards such as Golgari Grave-Troll and Stinkweed Imp. By constantly dredging and sacrificing creatures, the player can generate a large number of creature tokens with Bridge from Below and Hogaak, Arisen Necropolis. Cards like Cabal Therapy and Narcomoeba help disrupt opponents' strategies while maintaining a steady flow of creatures on the battlefield. With careful management of resources and strategic plays, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a powerful combo finish.

The deck focuses on utilizing infect creatures like Blighted Agent and Glistener Elf to quickly deal 10 poison counters and secure a win. It utilizes powerful pump spells like Invigorate and Vines of Vastwood to increase the damage output of the infect creatures. With strong protection spells like Daze and Force of Will, the deck aims to defend against removal spells and disruption from the opponent. The deck also includes card draw spells like Brainstorm and Ponder to ensure consistency in drawing key combo pieces.

The key concept of this Legacy 1 vs 1 Aggro - Canadian Threshold deck is to apply early pressure on the opponent while maintaining control of the game through versatile spells. The deck utilizes efficient creatures like Delver of Secrets and Hooting Mandrills, supported by spells like Brainstorm, Daze, Force of Will, and Lightning Bolt. It also includes disruptive elements such as Wasteland and Spell Pierce. The addition of Oko, Thief of Crowns provides additional utility and threat. The deck aims to disrupt and control the opponent's game plan while maintaining a consistent aggressive presence.

The main focus of this deck is to play aggressively with low-cost, high-power creatures like Death's Shadow and Delver of Secrets. By using cards like Brainstorm, Daze, and Force of Will to control the board, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats. The inclusion of cards like Snuff Out and Fatal Push allows for removal of opposing creatures, while cards like Thoughtseize and Stubborn Denial disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck also has some flexibility with cards like Brazen Borrower and Reanimate to deal with different situations.

The deck aims to quickly cheat powerful creatures such as Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Griselbrand into play by casting Show and Tell or Sneak Attack. Key cards like Lotus Petal, Simian Spirit Guide, and Daze help the player accelerate their game plan while also disrupting the opponent with cards like Force of Will. Brainstorm, Ponder, and Preordain are used to find the combo pieces quickly. The deck is designed to overwhelm the opponent with big threats before they can set up their own game plan, leading to a swift victory.
